plot: Believing he has only a month to live, average guy Joe McDoakes decides to live life to the fullest in the time he has left.
title: So You Want to Enjoy Life
plot_es: Believing he has only a month to live, average guy Joe McDoakes decides to live life to the fullest in the time he has left.
original_name: So You Want to Enjoy Life
plot_en: Believing he has only a month to live, average guy Joe McDoakes decides to live life to the fullest in the time he has left.
